content.question: Reliqua pars lateris huius servorum libertorumque usibus detinetur (lines 1-2) is translated

choices.label: The rest of this wide part is reserved for the slaves and freedmen to use it
The remaining part of these sides will be reserved to be used by the slaves and freedmen
The rest of this wide part will be reserved, since the slaves and freedmen have used it
The remaining part of this side is reserved for the use of the slaves and freedmen

content.answer: The remaining part of this side is reserved for the use of the slaves and freedmen

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose
